definition: to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: It was Guri who killed the entire board of directors for the rival Ororo Transportation.
sentences.chinese: 是古麗清洗了競爭對手奧羅羅運輸公司的整個董事會。

sentences.english: NOTE Data should be compared with those of competitors andor appropriate benchmarks .
sentences.chinese: 數據應該與競爭對手和或適當的基準的數據相比較。

sentences.english: Underestimate Ren at your peril, Ren's competitors say.
sentences.chinese: 競爭對手們說，小看任正非就是在冒險。

sentences.english: There will be mulitple competitors prices listed on each of my product pages.
sentences.chinese: 將多張有競爭對手在我的產品的每個網頁列出的價格。

sentences.english: The packings and advertising propaganda of our company can't obviously compare with our competitor.
sentences.chinese: 我們公司在產品的包裝和宣傳上明顯比不上競爭對手。

sentences.english: After all, we seem to have killed off all our prehistoric competitors.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，我們似乎已經殺死了所有史前的競爭對手。

sentences.english: What can you do to distinguish yourself from your competition?
sentences.chinese: 怎麼樣做才能讓你和競爭對手區分開來呢？

sentences.english: She outshines all the other competitors.
I used a few tactics to keep my competition in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 我略施小計，使競爭對手不知所措。

sentences.english: Atcheson's company and its competitors screen the driving records of prospective borrowers.
sentences.chinese: 艾奇遜的公司和屏幕準借款人的駕駛記錄其競爭對手。

sentences.english: If you can offer something for free, so can your competitors.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能提供免費品，你的競爭對手也可以。

sentences.english: Not all of Nintendo's rivals have shared its suffering.
sentences.chinese: 任天堂的競爭對手並非都有它的遭遇。

sentences.english: For example, do you have something that is uniquely different from your competitors?
sentences.chinese: 例如，相對於你的競爭對手，你獨特的地方是什麼？

sentences.english: Ltd. to become TTK's biggest competitors.
sentences.chinese: 成爲TTK公司最大的競爭對手。

sentences.english: Who keeps a pulse on market trends and competitors’ moves?
sentences.chinese: 誰去掌握市場趨勢和競爭對手的動向？

sentences.english: Thailand exports almost twice the amount of rice as India, its nearest rival.
sentences.chinese: 泰國出口的大米接近其最近的競爭對手印度的兩倍。

definition: tycoon/magnate/big player (including company, country, school etc)/big shot
merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
